mapper.delete: delete from mdm_bom where item_id in (${ids})
update mdm_bom set status=#{status} where item_id in (${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM mdm_bom mb where 1=1 and mb.bom_name like '%${bom_name}%' and mb.comment like '%${comment}%'

SELECT mb.* FROM mdm_bom mb where 1=1
and mb.bom_name like '%${bom_name}%' and mb.comment like '%${comment}%' ORDER BY update_date desc limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}

SELECT mb.*, fu_create.USER_NAME as create_name, fu_update.USER_NAME as update_name FROM mdm_bom mb LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu_create on mb.create_by = fu_create._id -- 创建人 LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu_update on mb.update_by = fu_update._id -- 更新人 where item_id=#{item_id}
